attributes.action: More Respect to the Hospitality Industry
attributes.additional_details: The Hospitality industry is getting worse and worse and i would like that the Government take better care of us about all the aspects
attributes.background: Give me the chance to be the person that ll represent the Hospitality industry and all the workers!

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the hospitality sector, however it's not clear what position you want to be appointed to.

In any case, we can't accept petitions relating to honours or appointments, including petitions calling for someone to be given, or to lose, a job. 

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action:

Appoint a Hospitality tsar: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616824
